class.name: Dictionary

method.name: Dictionary
method.description: Constructs a [Dictionary] as a copy of the given [Dictionary].

method.name: clear
method.description: Clear the dictionary, removing all key/value pairs.

method.name: duplicate
method.description: Creates a copy of the dictionary, and returns it. The [code]deep[/code] parameter causes inner dictionaries and arrays to be copied recursively, but does not apply to objects.

method.name: erase
method.description: Erase a dictionary key/value pair by key. Returns [code]true[/code] if the given key was present in the dictionary, [code]false[/code] otherwise. Does not erase elements while iterating over the dictionary.

method.name: get
method.description: Returns the current value for the specified key in the [Dictionary]. If the key does not exist, the method returns the value of the optional default argument, or [code]null[/code] if it is omitted.

method.name: has
has_all
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the dictionary has all the keys in the given array.

method.name: hash
is_empty
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the dictionary is empty.

method.name: keys
method.description: Returns the list of keys in the [Dictionary].

method.name: size
method.description: Returns the number of keys in the dictionary.

method.name: values
method.description: Returns the list of values in the [Dictionary].
